CustomField.description: Nov 2016 - Data fed in from data warehouse integration.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays % sales are declining on a 3 month-rolling basis compared to the same 3 months of the prior year. Formula: (Sales Last 3 Months - Sales Same 3 Months Last Year)/Sales Last 3 Months. A negative migration percentage denotes an increase in sales.
CustomField.label: Migration %
